title: IREDA gets DIPAM nod to set up subsidiary to handle retail, B2B biz in RE segment
description: IREDA, a state-run RE financing agency, has received DIPAMâ€™s approval to form a subsidiary for handling retail and B2B business in renewable energy. The new unit will focus on PM-Suryaghar, PM-KUSUM schemes, EVs, energy storage, and sustainability, enhancing support for urban and rural consumers.
